Click Here TERMS & CONDITIONS By booking in Hamugaway Pets Boarding and Daycare, you agree to these terms and conditions. We reserve the right to refuse if a pet appears to be sick, injured, or if its behavior may endanger others. We are not responsible for any personal items left with your pet. Illness or Injury: If a pet becomes ill or is injured, we may provide necessary medical care at our discretion and will notify the owner. Pre-existing Conditions: If your pet has a pre-existing condition that is aggravated by their stay, we will notify you and may seek veterinary care at our discretion. Medical Expenses: You are responsible for any medical expenses incurred due to your pet's illness or injury. Updated Information: We require that pets have updated vaccines. We need the owners to declare their pet's medical history, the type of diet and other details that we may deem necessary for the booking to be confirmed. Food and Supplies: You are responsible for providing food, vitamins, and other essentials for your pet. Socialization: Your pet may interact with other pets during their stay unless you specify otherwise. If your dog bites another pet or a staff member, you agree to cover all medical expenses and related costs. The owner agrees and grant us the permission to take photos of the pet and publish them on social media. Check-in time is 10AM. If you need to check-in at an earlier time, you may advise us for schedule plotting. Add-on fee of Php 50/hour will be charged for check-ins before 10AM. Check-out time is 2PM. Failure to pickup the pet at checkout time will incur Php 50/pet/hour or the Day Care rate, whichever is lower. Hamugaway Pet Boarding and Daycare provides services "as is" without warranties of any kind.
8. Check-in & Check-out
*there may be changes upon check-in
(Pet size, Additional Charges).
